mapper.select: select E.employee_name as employee_name , to_char(R.startDate, 'hh24:mi') as startDate , to_char(R.endDate, 'hh24:mi') as endDate , R.status as status from reservation_table R join employees_table E on R.fk_employee_seq = E.employee_seq where R.fk_roomNumber = #{fk_roomNumber} and to_char(R.startDate, 'yyyy. mm. dd') = #{rsvtDate}

select employee_seq, searchResult from ( select distinct E.employee_seq , E.employee_name || ' <' || D.department_name || '/' || P.position_name || '>' AS searchResult from department_table D join employees_table E on D.department_seq = E.fk_department join position_table P on E.fk_position = P.position_seq ) V where lower(searchResult) like '%' || lower(#{searchHead}) || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into reservation_table(reservation_seq, fk_employee_seq, fk_roomNumber, startDate, endDate, head_seq, memberCount, reason, status) values(reservation_table_seq.nextval, #{fk_employee_seq}, #{fk_roomNumber}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy. mm. dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy. mm. dd hh24:mi'), #{head_seq}, #{memberCount}, #{reason}, default)
